alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 6:38PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Collier County through 715 PM EDT... At 638 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Orangetree to 10 miles southeast of Golden Gate Estates to Plantation Island. Movement was west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Naples, Marco Island, Chokoloskee, Ave Maria, Golden Gate Estates, Everglades City, Immokalee, Plantation Island, Carnestown, Cape Romano, Belle Meade, Orangetree, Golden Gate, East Naples, Lely Resort, Copeland, Big Corkscrew Island, Vineyards, Royal Palm Hammock and Naples Park. LIGHTNING...EXCESSIVE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Excessive cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County; Mainland Monroe
